mapper.select: SELECT ca.cartid, ca.custid, it.pname as item_name, it.price as item_price, it.image as item_image, ca.cnt, ca.total FROM cart ca INNER JOIN item it ON ca.itemid = it.itemid WHERE ca.cartid = #{cartid}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET itemid =#{itemid}, cnt=#{cnt} WHERE cartid = #{cartid}
